original: @39b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @39b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya badzra sva ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya badzra sva ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
translated: Āryavajra-sārasvatī-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining the Noble Vajra Sarasvatī

original: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal @40a * //
analyzed: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal @40a * //
translated: Homage to the Noble Vajra Sarasvatī!

original: lo ; / yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung gter yon tan rang bzhin rdo rje dbyangs can la btud nas //
analyzed: lo ; / yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung gter yon tan rang bzhin rdo rje dbyangs can la btud nas //
translated: Having bowed to Vajra Sarasvatī, the treasure of speech of the perfect Buddha, whose nature is qualities,

original: rang la mnyes byed phan mdzad mdzes pa'i rol ldan spro zhing rtsod pas thub par dka' mdzad ma //
analyzed: rang la mnyes byed phan mdzad mdzes pa'i rol ldan spro zhing rtsod pas thub par dka' mdzad ma //
translated: She who is pleasing to oneself, beneficial, beautiful, playful, difficult to conquer through debate,

original: de ni yang dag mnyes byed phan phyir srid pa byed cing mi bzad mi shes mun pa 'joms //
analyzed: de ni yang dag mnyes byed phan phyir srid pa byed cing mi bzad mi shes mun pa 'joms //
translated: She who is truly pleasing, for the sake of benefit, acts in existence, and conquers the unbearable darkness of ignorance,

original: blo ngan ngag gi ched du sems can phan phyir legs par gsungs pa'i cho ga brjod par bya //
analyzed: blo ngan ngag gi ched du sems can phan phyir legs par gsungs pa'i cho ga brjod par bya //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, I will properly explain the ritual of the well-spoken [Vajra Sarasvatī].

original: dang por snga bar kha la sogs pa dag pa'i rang bzhin snying rje dang ldan bzod ldan pas //
analyzed: dang por snga bar kha la sogs pa dag pa'i rang bzhin snying rje dang ldan bzod ldan pas //
translated: First, in the early morning, with a pure mouth and so forth, compassionate, patient,

original: sngags pas gtsang ma'i stan la byams pa'i dga' bas myos shing gang zhig dga' ba dag gis ni //
analyzed: sngags pas gtsang ma'i stan la byams pa'i dga' bas myos shing gang zhig dga' ba dag gis ni //
translated: The mantrin, intoxicated with the joy of love on a pure seat, should visualize, with a mind full of joy,

original: yid dang mthun pa'i dben pa'i gnas su yang ni dga' bas rang gi snying gar padma blta //
analyzed: yid dang mthun pa'i dben pa'i gnas su yang ni dga' bas rang gi snying gar padma blta //
translated: in a solitary place that is pleasing to the mind, a lotus in his heart.

original: de 'dir sprul par brjod pa'i ri bong 'dzin pa la ni yang dag bsgom bya de la yang //
analyzed: de 'dir sprul par brjod pa'i ri bong 'dzin pa la ni yang dag bsgom bya de la yang //
translated: There he should meditate on the moon, which is said to be the emanation of the rabbit-holder.

original: de nas do:yi 'od zer gyis ni 'di nas kyang ni phyogs gzhan kun ni yongs su bkang //
analyzed: de nas do:yi 'od zer gyis ni 'di nas kyang ni phyogs gzhan kun ni yongs su bkang //
translated: Then, with the light rays of the moon, he should fill all other directions from here.

original: sangs rgyas tshogs ni kun du bltas la mchod pa la sogs 'di ni bsgom par rab tu bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas tshogs ni kun du bltas la mchod pa la sogs 'di ni bsgom par rab tu bya //
translated: He should visualize the assembly of Buddhas everywhere, and make offerings to them, and so forth.

original: me tog la sogs de nas phyag byas 'dir ni sdig pa bshags pa de bzhin rab tu bya //
analyzed: me tog la sogs de nas phyag byas 'dir ni sdig pa bshags pa de bzhin rab tu bya //
translated: Then, having made offerings of flowers, and so forth, he should confess his sins in the same way.

original: sngags rig pas ni bsod nams rjes su yi rang skyabs gsum yang dag rab tu 'gro bar bya //
analyzed: sngags rig pas ni bsod nams rjes su yi rang skyabs gsum yang dag rab tu 'gro bar bya //
translated: The mantrin should rejoice in the merit, and go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: shes bya la sogs smon lam legs btab de yis bdag nyid kyis ni dmigs par rab tu bya //
analyzed: shes bya la sogs smon lam legs btab de yis bdag nyid kyis ni dmigs par rab tu bya //
translated: Having made excellent aspirations for knowledge, and so forth, he should visualize himself as the deity.

original: gcig dang du ma dang bral lta bur yongs brjod ba den zhing dag par shes rtogs pas //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma dang bral lta bur yongs brjod ba den zhing dag par shes rtogs pas //
translated: And free from one and many is the recitation.

original: de nas sna tshogs thams cad rnam rtog dra ba ma lus stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya //
analyzed: de nas sna tshogs thams cad rnam rtog dra ba ma lus stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya //
translated: Then meditate on all variety as the entire net of conceptualization as emptiness.

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Om shunyata jnana vajra svabhava atmako ham.

original: stong nyid las byung padma dang ni zla ba la gnas yang ni do:yig dmar po ste //
analyzed: stong nyid las byung padma dang ni zla ba la gnas yang ni do:yig dmar po ste //
translated: From emptiness arises a lotus and moon, upon which is a red A syllable,

original: sna tshogs dag gi 'od zer tshogs ni shin tu mdzes par gyur pa'i padma 'dab brgyad pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs dag gi 'od zer tshogs ni shin tu mdzes par gyur pa'i padma 'dab brgyad pa //
translated: From which arises an eight-petaled lotus, very beautiful with a mass of light rays of various colors.

original: de las dmar zhing 'od zer chen po dang ldan bcom ldan 'das ma bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
analyzed: de las dmar zhing 'od zer chen po dang ldan bcom ldan 'das ma bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
translated: From that arises the Bhagavati, red and endowed with great light rays, adorned with excellent ornaments,

original: g-yon brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis yang dag gnas shing zhal gsum phyag drug dag gis rab brgyan pa //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis yang dag gnas shing zhal gsum phyag drug dag gis rab brgyan pa //
translated: Standing with her left leg straight, with three faces and six arms,

original: g-yas pa'i zhal ni sngo zhing phyag na padma ral gri gri gug rab tu bsnams pa ste //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i zhal ni sngo zhing phyag na padma ral gri gri gug rab tu bsnams pa ste //
translated: Her right face blue, holding a lotus, sword, and flaying knife,

original: zhal g-yon dkar zhing lhung bzed dang bcas de bzhin rin chen 'khor lor rab tu ldan pa'i phyag //
analyzed: zhal g-yon dkar zhing lhung bzed dang bcas de bzhin rin chen 'khor lor rab tu ldan pa'i phyag //
translated: His left face is white and holds an alms bowl, and likewise his hands hold a jewel and a wheel.

original: snying gar padma la gnas zla ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'bar @40b ba'i do:yig de dang ni //
analyzed: snying gar padma la gnas zla ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'bar @40b ba'i do:yig de dang ni //
translated: In his heart, on a lotus and moon seat, is a blazing letter DHIH,

original: sna tshogs mi shes mun pa 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyis ni 'gro ba ma lus rab tu 'gengs //
analyzed: sna tshogs mi shes mun pa 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyis ni 'gro ba ma lus rab tu 'gengs //
translated: And with light rays that conquer the darkness of ignorance, he fills the entire world.

original: yang dag bsdus la rang gi snying gar zla bar gnas pa'i sa bon la gnas bltas la yang ni spro //
analyzed: yang dag bsdus la rang gi snying gar zla bar gnas pa'i sa bon la gnas bltas la yang ni spro //
translated: Again, he gathers back into the seed syllable in his heart, on a moon seat, and again he radiates.

original: de nyid yang dang yang du rgyun du snyom las med par nyin re bsam par rab byas te ;
analyzed: de nyid yang dang yang du rgyun du snyom las med par nyin re bsam par rab byas te ;
translated: Again and again, continuously, without laziness, he should do this visualization every day.

original: / bsam gtan skyo na sa bon mnyam skyes bsdus la sngags 'di yi ni bzlas pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: / bsam gtan skyo na sa bon mnyam skyes bsdus la sngags 'di yi ni bzlas pa rab tu bya //
translated: When tired of meditation, he should gather back the seed syllable, born simultaneously with him, and do the recitation of this mantra.

original: do shal g-yo zhing gsal ba'i rim pas 'byung bas yid bzhin du ni sngags kyi bzlas pa bya /
analyzed: do shal g-yo zhing gsal ba'i rim pas 'byung bas yid bzhin du ni sngags kyi bzlas pa bya /
translated: With a garland swaying and shining, he should do the mantra recitation as desired.

original: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradzny'a wardha ni dzva la dzva la me dh'a bardha ni /
analyzed: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradzny'a wardha ni dzva la dzva la me dh'a bardha ni /
translated: Oṃ picu picu prajñāvardhani jvala jvala medhāvardhani

original: dhi ri dhi ri /
analyzed: dhi ri dhi ri /
translated: dhiri dhiri

original: budhi war dha ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: budhi war dha ni sv'a h'a /
translated: budhivardhani svāhā.

original: thun mtshams thams cad du ni lha mo'i gzugs la yid kyis rtag par shin tu rab dga' bas //
analyzed: thun mtshams thams cad du ni lha mo'i gzugs la yid kyis rtag par shin tu rab dga' bas //
translated: In all the sessions, always with a mind of intense joy in the form of the goddess,

original: yang dag gsungs pa'i cho gas sems can don gyi rgyur ni sngags 'di yongs su bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: yang dag gsungs pa'i cho gas sems can don gyi rgyur ni sngags 'di yongs su bzlas pa bya //
translated: one should recite this mantra for the sake of sentient beings, according to the prescribed ritual.

original: bsod nams bsngo bya dgos pas byed na bsam gtan rtse gcig nges par gnas pas bskyang bya ste //
analyzed: bsod nams bsngo bya dgos pas byed na bsam gtan rtse gcig nges par gnas pas bskyang bya ste //
translated: If one wishes to dedicate the merit, one should maintain it with single-pointed concentration.

original: ji srid 'bum phrag yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni rdzogs 'gyur nas ni las kyi rim bzhin bya //
analyzed: ji srid 'bum phrag yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni rdzogs 'gyur nas ni las kyi rim bzhin bya //
translated: Until the hundred thousand recitations are completed, one should perform the ritual sequence.

original: rnam pa thams cad du ni mi mthun phyogs su nye bar song yang de nyid bsam gtan byed //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du ni mi mthun phyogs su nye bar song yang de nyid bsam gtan byed //
translated: In all circumstances, even when approaching unfavorable conditions, one should maintain concentration.

original: dkar po'i tshes gcig nyid nas shin tu mdzes pa'i yid kyis ji srid zla ba gnas pa'i bar //
analyzed: dkar po'i tshes gcig nyid nas shin tu mdzes pa'i yid kyis ji srid zla ba gnas pa'i bar //
translated: From the first day of the bright fortnight, with a very beautiful mind, for as long as the moon remains,

original: de snyed sbyar ba'i skad cig nub re bzhin du ji snyed zla ba nya ba'i bar du bya //
analyzed: de snyed sbyar ba'i skad cig nub re bzhin du ji snyed zla ba nya ba'i bar du bya //
translated: for that many moments of conjunction, every evening, until the full moon.

original: de nyid kyi ni nub mo thub par dka' ba'i tshigs bcad mkhan gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ni nub mo thub par dka' ba'i tshigs bcad mkhan gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
translated: On that very night, one will attain the accomplishment of being a difficult-to-conquer poet.

original: gang zhig dpal ldan nag po'i rgyal pos dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud du gnas byas pa //
analyzed: gang zhig dpal ldan nag po'i rgyal pos dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud du gnas byas pa //
translated: The glorious Vajra Sarasvatī, who was appointed by the glorious King of Darkness in the Tantra of Glorious Yamāri,

original: dpal dang ldan pa'i rdo rje dbyangs can bcom ldan 'das ma de ni yang dag mnyes pa'i thabs //
analyzed: dpal dang ldan pa'i rdo rje dbyangs can bcom ldan 'das ma de ni yang dag mnyes pa'i thabs //
translated: that glorious Vajra Sarasvatī, the Blessed One, is the means of true propitiation.

original: sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du bdag gis byas pa'i bsod nams yang dag gyur pa des //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du bdag gis byas pa'i bsod nams yang dag gyur pa des //
translated: By that merit which I have truly accomplished for the benefit of sentient beings,

original: des ni 'gro kun nag po lta bur thub par dka' ba'i tshigs bcad mkhan ni grub par shog / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dpal 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: des ni 'gro kun nag po lta bur thub par dka' ba'i tshigs bcad mkhan ni grub par shog / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dpal 'dzin gyis //
translated: may all beings attain the accomplishment of being difficult-to-conquer poets, like the King of Darkness.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can gyi //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can gyi //
translated: By the glorious Vajra Sarasvatī,

original: 'joms byed mthar ni byed pa yi //
analyzed: 'joms byed mthar ni byed pa yi //
translated: the means of accomplishment

original: sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'di byas so //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'di byas so //
translated: was composed by me, Buddha Yogashri.

original: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of Vajra Sarasvatī

original: slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
translated: The composition of the master Shri-dhara is complete.

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus pa'o /
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus pa'o /
translated: It was translated and revised by the pandit Amoghavajra and the Khampa translator-editor Gelongma Palmo.
